SEARCH
Package com.safetynetalerts.api.controller

Class AlertController

java.lang.Object
com.safetynetalerts.api.controller.AlertController
@RestController public class AlertController extends Object
Controller for handling alert-related API endpoints. This controller provides methods to retrieve information for child, phone, fire, flood, person information and community emails.

      public AlertController()

  • Method Details

    • getChildPerAddress

      @GetMapping("/childAlert") public ChildAlertDTO getChildPerAddress(@RequestParam String address)
      Retrieves child for a given address. This method returns a list of children (under 18 years old) living at the specified address.
      Parameters:
      address - the address for which to retrieve child alert information
      Returns:
      a ChildAlertDTO containing children and family members information

    • getPhonePerStation

      @GetMapping("/phoneAlert") public PhoneAlertDTO getPhonePerStation(@RequestParam Integer firestation)
      Retrieves phone numbers of persons covered by a specific fire station.
      Parameters:
      firestation - the fire station number
      Returns:
      a PhoneAlertDTO containing the phone numbers of persons in the fire station's coverage area

    • getPersonPerAddress

      @GetMapping("/fire") public FireDTO getPersonPerAddress(@RequestParam String address)
      Retrieves information for persons and the fire station responsible for a specific address. This includes medical information and emergency details.
      Parameters:
      address - the address for which to retrieve fire information
      Returns:
      a FireDTO containing details of persons and the associated fire station

    • getHomePerStation

      @GetMapping("/flood/stations") public List<FloodDTO> getHomePerStation(@RequestParam Integer[] stations)
      Retrieves a list of homes in areas covered by the given fire stations and their respective inhabitants. This is used during flood scenarios.
      Parameters:
      stations - an array of fire station numbers
      Returns:
      a list of FloodDTO objects containing home and person details for the specified stations

    • getInfoPerPerson

      @GetMapping("/personInfolastName") public List<PersonInfoLastNameDTO> getInfoPerPerson(@RequestParam String lastName)
      Retrieves information for persons based on their last name. This includes medical records and other details.
      Parameters:
      lastName - the last name of the person(s) to search for
      Returns:
      a list of PersonInfoLastNameDTO containing information of persons with the given last name

    • getEmail

      @GetMapping("/communityEmail") public List<String> getEmail(@RequestParam String city)
      Retrieves a list of community email addresses based on the city.
      Parameters:
      city - the city for which to retrieve email addresses
      Returns:
      a list of emails of persons living in the specified city
